function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mix of academia and industry respondents may lead to conflicting views on occupant health in buildings.","Impact":"Inconsistent or conflicting approaches to occupant health assessment can result in suboptimal building designs and health measures.","Mitigation":"Conducting joint workshops or seminars to align academia and industry views, and establishing interdisciplinary research collaborations.","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms and communication tools to facilitate knowledge sharing and consensus building.","People":"Building industry professionals and academic researchers.","Owner":"Industry associations and research institutions."},{"Description":"Limited representation of doctors and public health workers in the survey may lead to a lack of expertise in health assessment.","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of medical and public health perspectives in building health assessments and strategies.","Mitigation":"Engaging medical and public health experts in advisory roles, and seeking their input in health assessment guidelines and protocols.","Technologies":"Telemedicine and remote consultation platforms for integrating medical expertise into building health assessments.","People":"Building industry professionals and survey organizers.","Owner":"Building industry associations and public health organizations."},{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic impact on building professional opinions may result in temporary shifts that are not sustainable for long-term health assessment strategies.","Impact":"Adoption of short-term reactive measures without considering long-term implications on building health assessment and design.","Mitigation":"Conducting regular follow-up surveys to track and analyze evolving opinions, and integrating pandemic-specific considerations into long-term strategies.","Technologies":"Survey and data analysis tools for continuous monitoring of professional opinions and trends.","People":"Building industry professionals and survey organizers.","Owner":"Building industry associations and public health organizations."}]}
